Package index

All functions

ba()
Functions from gamlss/gamlss.add with bugs fixed
construct_data()
Construct the input data (covariate matrix and expression matrix)
example_sce
A SingleCellExperiment object containing both cell type and pseudotime
extract_para()
Extract the parameters of each cell's distribution
fit_copula()
Fit the copula model
fit_marginal()
Fit the marginal models
ga()
Functions from gamlss/gamlss.add with bugs fixed
gamlss.ba()
Support for Function ba()
gamlss.ga()
Support for Function ga()
perform_lrt()
Perform the likelihood ratio test
plot_reduceddim()
Dimensionality reduction and visualization
scdesign3()
The wrapper for the whole scDesign3 pipeline
simu_new()
Simulate new data
sparse_cov()
This function computes the thresholding sparse covariance/correlation estimator with the optimal threshold level.

Developed by Dongyuan Song, Qingyang Wang, Chenxin Jiang.
